name: Naruto
description: A young ninja with a dream of becoming the strongest ninja and earning the title of Hokage. Follow Naruto's journey as he overcomes challenges and battles powerful foes.

name: One Piece
description: Join Monkey D. Luffy and his crew as they embark on a grand adventure to find the legendary One Piece treasure and become the Pirate King.

name: Demon Slayer
description: Tanjiro Kamado, a kind-hearted boy, becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered by demons. He seeks revenge and aims to save his sister who turned into a demon.

name: Attack On Titan
description: In a world where humanity lives within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, colossal humanoid creatures, Eren Yeager joins the fight against the Titans.

name: One Punch Man
description: Saitama, a hero for fun, can defeat any opponent with a single punch. However, he struggles with boredom due to his overwhelming strength.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuji Itadori becomes a vessel for a cursed object, leading him to join a secret organization to fight curses and protect humanity from supernatural threats.

name: Bleach
description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the abilities of a Soul Reaper and is tasked with protecting humans from evil spirits and guiding the souls of the deceased to the afterlife.

name: Death Note
description: Light Yagami discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing the person's name while picturing their face.
